articles.title: Six Things That Stood Out for the Titans in Saturday Night's Preseason Win Over the Buccaneers - Tennessee Titans
articles.description: The Titans beat the Buccaneers 13-3 in preseason game No.2 on Saturday night at Nissan Stadium. Senior Writer and Editor Jim Wyatt takes a look at six things that stood out from the contest.
articles.content:
Weaver Making Plays Again
